pageTitle: %s's bank or building society account details
h1: %s's bank or building society account details

reviewBlock.sectionHeaderNew: Details of new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.sectionHeader: Details of person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changePayeeName: name of new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changeEmailAddress: email address for new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changeAddress: postcode and address for new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changeAccountName: account name and account details for new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changeSortCode: sort code and account details for new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changeAccountNumber: account number and account details for new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.changeRollNumber: building society roll number and account details for new person or company being paid
reviewBlock.insetText: You can change these details to
reviewBlock.insetTextLink: pay a person or company we've paid before

mismatchAccountDetails: We could not match these details to an account. Make sure they are correct and try again

required.inline: Enter the name on the account
required.summary: Enter the name on the account

invalid.inline: Enter a valid sort code like 309430
invalid.summary: Enter a valid sort code like 309430

invalidLength.inline: Enter a valid sort code like 309430
invalidLength.summary: Enter a valid sort code like 309430

accountNumber.label: Account number
accountNumber.hint: Must be between 6 and 8 digits long

tooLong.inline: Account number must be between 6 and 8 digits
tooLong.summary: Account number must be between 6 and 8 digits

invalidChars.inline: Enter a valid account number like 00733445
invalidChars.summary: Enter a valid account number like 00733445

tooShort.inline: Account number must be between 6 and 8 digits
tooShort.summary: Account number must be between 6 and 8 digits

rollNumber.label: Building society roll number (if there is one)
rollNumber.hint: You can find it on the card, statement or passbook

invalid.inline: Building society roll number must only include letters a to z, numbers, hyphens, spaces, forward slashes and full stops
invalid.summary: Building society roll number must only include letters a to z, numbers, hyphens, spaces, forward slashes and full stops

tooLong.inline: Building society roll number must be between 1 and 18 characters
tooLong.summary: Building society roll number must be between 1 and 18 characters
